-NbLXxRIgCeo_RwPYReG.aboutYou: I was a TV director in San Francisco for years before moving to Utah.
-NbLXxRIgCeo_RwPYReG.funFact: I love camping and being in nature. If I go on vacation, it better be near water.
-NbLXxRIgCeo_RwPYReG.name: Chris Bell

-NbPSe32xTTxGkja1yle.aboutYou: I started off my creative career in the equine industry before starting at a R&R! I grew up showjumping (started riding horses at age 4 and by 5yo I was competing) and was recruited to ride for Fresno State on their NCAA D1 Equestrian team and given a scholarship! I graduated shortly before covid started so come 2020, I knew moving to a new state and getting hired was going to be difficult so I worked at a barn in Colorado as their head groom/ manager. I cared and rode horses valued up to $500,000 and in 2022 I had a career change and started interning at R&R and was then hired full time!
-NbPSe32xTTxGkja1yle.funFact: I love to bake!! Itâ€™s my way of showing people I care for them! My dream is to one day have my own baking business (retirement goals, hello!!) I also love to read, snowboard and ski, hike, and go to concerts and music festivals!
-NbPSe32xTTxGkja1yle.name: Danielle schneider

-NbPriV9UNliVZQ25n9k.aboutYou: I started my career working in fashion production in New York City. I love four seasons, even cold weather. Lakes in the summer and skiing in the winter. I have a King Charles Cavalier. I reunited with and married my high school boyfriend 18 years after we graduated.
-NbPriV9UNliVZQ25n9k.funFact: I'm grew up in the Upper Peninsula of Michigan, also known as a Yooper!
-NbPriV9UNliVZQ25n9k.name: Hanna Koivunen

-NbPzlvNDn4XWvDvq3NT.aboutYou: I am an adventure junkie who loves traveling, eating, and listening to good music.
-NbPzlvNDn4XWvDvq3NT.funFact: I took a 14 month career break to travel. I went to Mexico, The Dominican Republic, Jamaica, London, Paris, Italy, and spent 3 months in Dubai.
-NbPzlvNDn4XWvDvq3NT.name: Marcella Flippin

-NbQ-1UHOTMN-nWEPhuK.aboutYou: I was born and raised in Hawaii and spent a couple years of my childhood in Japan. Moved out to California after college but have been loving it.
-NbQ-1UHOTMN-nWEPhuK.funFact: I have been getting back into reading, which is something I used to love as a kid. I also really like being outdoors in nature, whether that be taking walks outside or going on a hike. I also love doing anything artistic like drawing, even though I am not necessarily good at it.
-NbQ-1UHOTMN-nWEPhuK.name: Nicole Williams

-NbQ1x2gCHtxDlY1NWtD.aboutYou: I was pre-Med and used to hip hop dance!
-NbQ1x2gCHtxDlY1NWtD.funFact: Baking! I love to make French pastries and edible art in the form of cake pops!
-NbQ1x2gCHtxDlY1NWtD.name: Jennifer Harlan

-NbQCpH7n3PACWFWD7SA.aboutYou:
I have a degree in interior design and photography and I never went to school for advertising or production. But I love how life has a way of showing you a different path that challenges you in the right ways to make you grow. 
I always ask people this question: "what is your dream job?" 
If I were to answer my own question I think my dream job would be running a Fine Arts Gallery somewhere with an amazing view :)
-NbQCpH7n3PACWFWD7SA.name: Gina Nelson

-NbQZ6vFbvTlOpLd-XV8.aboutYou: After I graduated college, I moved to Moscow, Russia to teach English for a couple of years. At first I worked for a British language school, but eventually I went private and taught in a gated village to oligarch children. I was really young when I was abroad and it was amazing meeting people from all over the world as well as the experience of being a stranger in a strange land. It was a really interesting time to be in Russia - Pussy Riot had just been arrested, Edward Snowden had just landed, there were rumors of war. I ended up leaving very suddenly when RU annexed Crimea in 2015 - it was certainly one way to spend your early twenties!
-NbQZ6vFbvTlOpLd-XV8.funFact: Those I work with closely likely know this, but I spend a lot of time rock climbing outdoors. During COVID, I moved into my van full time and traveled up and down the west coast, chasing the good weather and good rock. The main reason I live in Las Vegas is for Red Rock and Charleston (during the summer). I love sport climbing and trad multi-pitch, but I can be convinced to boulder every now and then. Climbing is one of the true loves of my life.
-NbQZ6vFbvTlOpLd-XV8.name: Lisa Horan

-NbQlSAuop-MYK2KubQp.aboutYou: I'm originally from Milwaukee, have lived in Chicago, and now reside in Dallas. I'm a K-12 Art Teacher by degree, but have worked in content production, brand development, marketing, and advertising my entire career.
-NbQlSAuop-MYK2KubQp.funFact: I love to travel, cook, play games (sports, cards, board games, etc.) and dabble in interior design.
-NbQlSAuop-MYK2KubQp.name: Renee Page
